reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress feels amazing and is very nicely made, with a deep red color and great material that feels nice. The dress is comfortable and flatters various body types, with one customer noting it's perfect for smoothing the belly, while another mentions it works well for broad shoulders and wide torsos. While the dress fits well, some customers note that the underskirt runs a bit short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't pass on this dress!!
items.body: Love love love this dress! It has a little stretch to it, but feels supportive in all of the right places. I am 5'1.5" and 125 and the small fit perfectly. It feels and looks very high quality and does not disappoint! Can be dressed up or down depending on your event. Read more
items.author: Christine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, flattering dress !
items.body: I love this dress and was pleasantly surprised by the quality and comfort. I wore it to a summer concert and the style was perfect and very flattering. My only issue is the slip is short and rode up often. That was annoying but not enough to return it. I would definitely purchase it in a different color. Read more
items.author: sha

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but rides up.
items.body: Will have to pin closed a little more and figure out how to keep inner slip from riding up. The slit unfortunately is up to my anatomical crotch. I think a larger size might have helped this but I am small up top and Iâ€™m not sure I could go larger there. Itâ€™s a nice color and attractive on though. Moving around will be tricky due to riding up and high slit. Other than that the material is comfortable. Not see through. Doesnâ€™t highlight imperfections like belly. Camouflages well a little pooch. I think the adjustable tie at neck is good to customize fit for different size chests too. Read more
items.author: Brooke

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute petite women enjoy
items.body: Dress is very cute nicely made. Well cut. Good material. Has a lining so you won't feel naked if that's what you're hoping for . Maybe warm spring, breezy summer day or fall with a jacket sweater for later . Runs tight not a lot of stretch so if you're 5'9 round stomach 230.. you'll need a 4x ðŸ˜¬ which they ain't got ðŸ¥¹ðŸ˜­ Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Buy Misses the Mark!
items.body: I started to give the dress a 1, but that may be a little harsh. It has potential, but like the last reviewer, it fits weird. I couldn't get it to not ride up, definitely need a body shaper if you don't want every dent showing. The main flaw...the stupid inside-out sewn slip!! It shows drastically through the material on the sides because the inside-out seems are so thick and the dress, so thin. It looks like someone in 7th grade home economics sewed this. It's super cute but the top also has huge gaps around the armpits, as if it needs to be taken in some. I'm a 36D and the large has too much room around the arm area, leven tightening the strings around the neck doesn't help. It also runs small, so I ordered med and large. I returned the medium, thinking the large was the answer. The seems, armpits, and material being too thin, totally disappointed me. It may work for someone because it's extremely cute on. I wanted to wear it so badly that I was willing to overlook the armpits and wear a cute sheer tie up blouse, but couldn't get past the undesirable, noticeable double seems on both hips...don't bother trying to line them up because it's not going to stay aligned Read more
items.author: T Sue

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eye-catching Eyelet Embroidery Dress
items.body: I really love this dress. The color and fit were perfect. I ordered a size large in the green color. The material is lightweight but heavy enough to fall easily into place. The halter top design,eyelet embroidery, and slit made the dress very unique. The price was not bad at all. I wore it on a cruise vacation and encountered a woman who said she had the same dress and was upset that she forgot it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress
items.body: Cute dress and picture color is accurate. It fits snug and I like that there is a little slip underneath the front slit. Not stretchy Read more
items.author: Marion Taylor

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and very well tailored dress
items.body: Very well made and accentuates your curves well. Read more
items.author: Debbie

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Yellow, Hot Pink, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
